document.full_text: as the players' suit against the n.f.l. begins wednesday with court arguments, they will be represented by jeffrey kessler, one of the most prominent and provocative lawyers in sports.
document.title: n.f.l. players put faith in lawyer's bold move
lines_and_colors: as the players' suit against the n.f.l. begins wednesday with court arguments, they will be represented by jeffrey kessler, one of the most prominent and provocative lawyers in sports.
